basic_information.scholarship_name: Emma Weaver Rodkey Endowed Graduate Studies Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Emma Weaver Rodkey Scholarship for Grad Ed

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to graduate students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing their masters degree in any area of Education. Eligibility Requirements Open to any graduate student pursuing their masters degree in any area of Education Full-time student Outstanding academic record (overall GPA, Content GPA, and current coursework GPA will be used to determine) Provides (3) letters of reference, with at least (2) from professors and (1) from a member of the community or an employer (past or present). Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
